allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Replace Rails app with Next.js 15 project scaffolding

Remove the entire legacy Rails codebase and initialize a modern
Next.js 15 \(App Router\) project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS,
shadcn/ui, Vitest, Playwright, and Prettier. This establishes the
foundation for the CLAHub v2 rewrite per the PRD.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C /Users/guntharp/Code/clahub add public/cla-logo.png src/app/apple-icon.png src/app/icon.png src/app/favicon.ico)

Bash(git -C /Users/guntharp/Code/clahub commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(assets\): add CLAHub logo and replace favicon

Add cla-logo.png to public directory, generate apple-icon.png \(180x180\)
and icon.png \(32x32\) from the logo, remove old favicon.ico.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/guntharp/Code/clahub commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
style\(theme\): replace grayscale palette with warm amber/brown

Update all OKLCH color variables in both light and dark modes to use
a warm amber/gold/brown palette derived from the CLAHub clipboard logo.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/guntharp/Code/clahub commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(ui\): add logo to header, update footer and OG metadata

Add CLAHub logo image to site header and layout OG metadata.
Update footer copyright to reflect project origin year \(2012\).
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/guntharp/Code/clahub commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(marketing\): restyle all pages with branded layout

Add hero logo to landing page. Rewrite terms, privacy, and why-cla
pages to use card-based layouts with icons and alternating section
bands consistent with the landing page design.
EOF
\)")
